    public class ControlTaskStateEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    The event generated when the control task is connected/disconnected/unstable

        public ControlTaskStateEvent(int id,
                     TaskGraph taskgraph,
                     int state)
        Constructs a task graph cable event
        Parameters:
        id - the id of this event (either CONTROL_TASK_CONNECTED, CONTROL_TASK_DISCONNECTED or CONTROL_TASK_UNSTABLE)
        state - the state of the control task
